summary: Encapsulates a play definition that aggregates roles, tasks, handlers, variables, and host specifications, offering mechanisms to load, validate, compile, and serialize the play for execution on target hosts.
business_intent: Provide a structured representation of a play so that users can define, prepare, and orchestrate a collection of actions (roles, tasks, handlers) along with associated variables and host constraints, enabling seamless conversion between data formats and readying the play for runtime execution.
